edge_1: Depp wore contacts that acted as sunglasses in the film.
edge_2: Depp found the script quirky and unique, as it focused on returning treasure rather than finding it and the mutiny had already taken place.
edge_3: By March 2002, Disney brought Stuart Beattie in to rewrite the script because of his knowledge of piracy.

edge_1: Depp carried a genuine pistol, which was made in London in 1760, in the film.
edge_2: Depp found the script quirky and unique, as it focused on returning treasure rather than finding it and the mutiny had already taken place.
edge_3: By March 2002, Disney brought Stuart Beattie in to rewrite the script because of his knowledge of piracy.
